content.question: The work shown demonstrates the influence of earlier northern European artistic traditions through

choices.label: the avoidance of figurative imagery in favor of purely abstract shapes
the use of filigree to create complex ornamental designs
the interlacing of stylized animal forms to create dense patterns
the division of the page into four different registers

content.answer: the interlacing of stylized animal forms to create dense patterns

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
